# init(container:)

**Initializer**

Creates and initializes an observer using the provided container.

## Declaration

```swift
init(container: CKContainer)
```

## Parameters

- **container**: The [doc://com.apple.cloudkit/documentation/CloudKit/CKContainer] for the sharing observer.
title: init(container:)
